Description:
Instant Family Style on Approx 647m2 of Land
In a blissfully quiet yet incredibly convenient cul-de-sac location, this impeccable 3 bedroom home provides a family environment of immediate appeal along with options to extend, rebuild or sub-divide in the future (STCA) taking advantage of its impressive land size.
Every room filled with natural light, the home's inviting interior comprises a large master
bedroom with walk-in robe & private ensuite, 2 additional bedrooms (both with built-in robes) & main family bathroom.
The spacious central lounge leads through to an open-design dining area & adjoining kitchen
with gas cooktop & plenty of cupboard space, plus the added family appeal of a full-size
laundry along with heating & cooling throughout. Step outside to discover a simply enormous north-facing backyard complete with undercover patio, workshop/storage shed (with power), large single garage & additional carport via secure gated driveway.
Walking distance to local buses & Hothlyn Drive Reserve, Craigieburn South Primary School & Craigieburn Secondary College, it's also close to Craigieburn Station, kinder & childcare
facilities, Aitken Creek trails, as well as major shopping centres & easy freeway access.
Insights: 7 Renwick Close, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Quality & Style in a Convenient Location
This modern home is guaranteed to impress with its generous design, impeccable presentation & long list of added features. Its smartly configured floor plan is designed for easy living, as this low maintenance residence boasts comfort & style that will delight all home buyers & investors alike.
From its attractive facade this home comprises 3 bedrooms (master with ensuite), gourmet kitchen including 900mm stainless steel appliances & stone benchtop with adjoining meals area, spacious family room, central bathroom, landscaped gardens & remote control garage.
Perfectly located close to a range of lifestyle attractions including public transport, parklands, Newbury Primary School, sporting facilities, childcare centre & local shops.
Insights: 16 Bolwarra Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
LIVE IN THE LAP OF LUXURY
On offer is this once in a lifetime opportunity.
Picture this, an immaculately designed and presented 4 bedroom home boasting nothing but elegance and luxury. Located in the ever sought after location on Highlander Drive. In addition, this property brings a great blend of style, luxury and elegance.
Ample living areas with a separate retreat upstairs and a study upon grand entrance, all generous in size which makes this magnificent home perfect for entertaining guests. Large master bedroom that boasts gorgeous views, deluxe ensuite and walk in robe- as well as 3 additional bedrooms, one bedroom with a BIR and the other two with WIRs.
The most luxurious hostess kitchen comes equipped with a waterfall stone benchtop and a generous size Walk-in Pantry. The elegant kitchen over looks to a generous size meals area and living space, add to that your very own alfresco to entertain family and friends all year round with a low maintenance rear yard.
Architectural refinement and the finest craftsmanship brings new magnificence to this truly prestigious family residence.
Every element is infused with the utmost quality to create a fine blend of form and function.
Generous indeed, this property also includes:
Fully landscaped gardens including automatic sprinklers
Theatre room
Top end stainless steel appliances including dishwasher
Caesar stone benchtops
Evaporative cooling system plus split systems
Alarm system
CCTV Camera surveillance
Electric roller shutters
and much much more!
Only your inspection will allow full appreciation of such an exceptional home in an enviable location!
Insights: 18 Highlander Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Auction this Saturday at 12pm!
Finally just what you've been waiting for! A rare & special offering perched high on the hill of Mt Ridley.
Perfectly orientated to capture the breathtaking views of the sensational skyline, mountains & surrounding areas & with an excellent wide frontage measuring 40m, this exceptionally large & rectangular allotment is sure to bring your dream home into a reality.
Surrounded by homes of quality & class, the elite location is everything you've ever hoped for with a range of amenities at your fingertips. This is the last opportunity you have & one not to be missed, so register your interest today to make your dreams a reality tomorrow.

Description:
Family Excellence with Indoor Style & Outdoor Space
In a family-focused Highlands neighbourhood with parkland at either end of the street, this freestanding 3 bedroom home delivers a ready-to-enjoy lifestyle of contemporary quality, floorplan flexibility & urban practicality.
Absolutely immaculate from start to finish, the home's inviting interior comprises a master bedroom with walk-in robe & private ensuite, 2 additional bedrooms (both with built-in robes) & spotless central bathroom. Dual living zones include a separate lounge & spacious open-plan family/dining area accompanied by a well-appointed kitchen complete with stainless steel cooking appliances & dishwasher.
Other features include ducted heating & split-system air-conditioning, additional ceiling fans (all bedrooms), instantaneous hot water, family-sized laundry, plus a surprisingly large backyard, internally-accessed double garage (remote-controlled) as well as a wide sideway with potential for additional off-street parking.
Moments from both Thorngrove Reserve & Watermill Reserve, it's also close to Malcolm Creek trails, public transport, popular primary & secondary schools as well as a choice of shopping centres.
Insights: 37 Thorngrove Avenue, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Presenting to you an opportunity that meets all the key criteria when purchasing property for capital growth. Located in the heart of Craigieburn in Highlands Estate giving you the luxury of manmade lakes and parklands only within walking distance. This triple story home with two bedrooms both with built in wardrobes, kitchen with stone benchtops with stainless steel appliances alongside the dining area and lounge room. Also featuring heating and cooling, dishwasher and single car garage. With only minutes' walk to shops, schools and public transport access this is the ideal opportunity for the first homeowner or astute investor.

Make an Offer! Must be Sold
Brand new home with luxury turn-key inclusions such as professionally styled interior colour themes, stone bench tops, carpets, security alarm, tiles, higher ceilings & stainless steel appliances. You can purchase this brand new quality Porter Davis home and rest easy knowing all you have to do is move in when it's completed.
With a large open plan dining/ living area, double car garage, 3 bedrooms, two bathrooms, including a master ensuite & walk in robe. Front landscaping, driveway and quality flooring are also all included in this beautiful home plus If you're a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG.
Call me now for further information or to arrange an inspection.

Description:
A Family Favourite
From the moment you step inside this beautiful family residence you will be surprised and delighted by the clever use of space and its flexible floor plan. The home has all the features a family could need rolled into a great location. Comprising of 2 downstairs bedrooms both with built in robes, upstairs master bedroom with walk in robe & ensuite, floorboards, large formal lounge & open study. The fully equipped renovated kitchen features 900ml stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and ample cupboard space. Adjacent to the kitchen is a generous size meals area leading out to an oversized alfresco perfect for entertaining all year round. Step outside and you will find perfectly manicured gardens with and plenty of space for the kids to play. The home has additional features including wall heating & cooling. Conveniently located in a quiet family friendly location close by to schools, public transport, shopping centres and more, you will be happy to call this one home. An Inspection Will Not Disappoint.

Description:
Modern & Spacious Family Entertainer - $10,000 FHOG for eligible buyers!!
18 Highpark Circuit, Craigieburn
(PLEASE USE IPHONE APPLE MAPS OR WWW.WHEREIS.COM TO FIND THE ADDRESS)
Ticks All The Buyer's Wish List
- Land size - 400 sqm approx
- Built Up - 25.25 approx
- Approx 600 m walk to Aitken Hill Primary School
- Approx 150 m walk to bus stop
- Approx 2 kms to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre
Mike Sarupria & Ray White Tarneit presents Porter Davis under construction beauty in the prestigious Mt Aitken Highlands Estate in heart of Craigieburn, just 45 minutes north of the city.
With 4 bedrooms and a spacious formal lounge, the formal lounge is well positioned at the front of the home to welcome people into the home or as a secluded place to enjoy downtime away from the home's main-living hub.
The family room is a dominant feature in the house - intimate, yet spacious and open and doused in natural light.
The kitchen also features a handy servery to the grand alfresco area, ensuring the living area is geared to year-round entertaining. It also has a walk-in pantry for convenient extra storage space.
18 Highpark Circuit features 4 bedrooms with master bedroom boasting a good size walk-in-robe and double vanity ensuite. Remaining 3 bedrooms comes with built in robes serviced by a central bathroom.
Inspired features are everywhere:
- Ducted heating
- Fully landscaped front & backyard
- 900 mm stainless steel gas cook top and range- hood
- 20 mm stone benchtop in kitchen and bathrooms
- Remote control double lock garage
- Security alarm system and much more!!
Ray White Tarneit welcomes you and looks forward to meet you at the open homes.
Call Mike on 0430 126 491 or Frank on 0426 425 361 today to set an appointment for private inspection!!
(PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTION)

Description:
Relax, Entertain & Enjoy.
Be quick to inspect this beautifully presented home offering gorgeous street appeal and quality interior features with an abundance of natural light & character for all home buyers and investors alike. Offering 2 bedrooms, fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances (900mm stove & oven) plus miele dishwasher, main bathroom with double vanity and over sized shower, master bedroom with built in robe & large open plan kitchen/meals/living. Step outside and you will find an entertainers delight, complete with under cover alfresco & surrounded by low maintenance landscaped gardens. A host of extras include high ceilings, ducted heating & split system cooling, intercom, plantation shutters, single carport with drive through & internal access, beautifully maintained carefree gardens and more. Ideal for a First Home, Investment or Retiree this home offers a blend of low maintenance living, without compromising space or comfort. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates (the Park View Estate) & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland, be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!

Description:
Quality, Convenience & Versatile Style
In an established Highlands neighbourhood with outstanding urban ease, this single-level home
is an ideal choice for young & growing families with its flexible floorplan, extensive features list & abundance of natural light throughout.
Instantly appealing with its wide entrance hallway, the home's impressive interior comprises 3 main bedrooms (large master with walk-in robe & ensuite), separate lounge/fourth bedroom & large family bathroom. Add to this an expansive open-plan living/dining area accompanied by a well-appointed kitchen complete with dishwasher, gas cooktop & ample cupboard space.
Other highlights of this ready-to-enjoy home include ducted heating & evaporative cooling,
high ceilings throughout & security shutters all-round, plus a sizeable backyard & internally-accessed double garage (remote-controlled).
Moments from the open spaces of Malcolm Creek parkland & endless walking/cycling trails,
it's also close to Aitken Boulevard buses & Mount Ridley College, as well as Highlands &
Craigieburn Central shopping centres.

Description:
Stylish Home, Central Location
High on accommodation, big on value, huge on lifestylethis is your chance to enjoy exceptional family living in a pocket sought after for its ease of access to parks, schools, transportation Craigieburn plaza Craigieburn station and much much more.
Delivering today's most in-demand family floorplan, it introduces fabulous accommodation options complementing them with enticing living areas and a huge all weather, all events alfresco.
Offering multiple living zones, this home comprises of a large formal lounge upon entry separate powder rooms, encompassing well-appointed kitchen with ample cabinetry overlooking a separate family/meals area.
A Separate living area overlooking to your generous size alfresco and low maintained rear yard will have you entertaining friends and family all year round.
Journey upstairs with 4 bedrooms, master with WIR and deluxe ensuite, remaining bedrooms are generous in size with BIR all serviced by a renovated central bathroom. Lets not forget a separate rumpus for the kids to enjoy a game or movie.
This home is sure to tick all of the boxes with further features including the comforts of ducted heating and evaporative cooling, double car garage, striking polished timber flooring, extensive down lights, ample storage, roller shutters, alarm system and much more.
This home is defiantly one not to miss, inspect with confidence and secure this family home.

Description:
A Charming New Beginning Awaits!
In a blissfully quiet family-focused neighbourhood, this freestanding home is sure to leave a lasting impression with its generous design, immaculate presentation & central location to all of Craigieburn's facilities.
Beyond the gorgeous period-inspired facade with timber cladding, discover an impeccable interior comprising of 3 double bedrooms (master with his/hers walk-in robe & private ensuite) equally stylish & modern main bathroom & separate WC. Flowing through the home is flawless timber flooring which leads out to a sun drenched open living/dining area accompanied by a well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel cooking appliances & two-drawer dishwasher.
Step directly outside onto a large spacious deck, big enough for entertaining the masses & located in the privacy of your own backyard. Other stand out features include; high ceilings, ducted heating & powerful split-system air-conditioning, full-size laundry plus lock up garage with drive-thru access & low-maintenance front & rear yard.
Located only a stones throw away to the sporting ground of Highgate Recreation Reserve & perfectly situated within walking distance to local buses, Malcolm Creek trails & acres of parkland, close to primary & secondary schools, kindergarten/childcare, as well as easy access to shopping centres & the freeway.

Description:
Perfect Family Home in a Brilliant Location!
Gorgeously presented family home situated in the highly sought-after Craigieburn precinct will be sure to impress all First Home Buyers and/or Investors. This home comprising of 3 great size bedrooms including master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe, generously sized kitchen with featuring stone benchtops & stainless-steel appliances, open plan meals and family area. Other additional features include, ducted heating and cooling, single garage with remote control & internal access and much more. Located in the sought-out Craigieburn Estate just steps from shopping centres, park lands, schools, public transport, this home ticks all the boxes with approximate 21sq of luxury gorgeous living.
Contact your agents
Sam Eryurek - 0418 133 331
Izzy Cengiz - 0455 111 332

Description:
Sheer Brilliance, Quality & Perfection!
Showcasing meticulous presentation, designer-inspired finishes & high-end credentials, this showpiece family residence is simply breathtaking.
Astutely designed, maximising space, light & functionality, it features a sophisticated entry, integrated study, expansive open plan family space, dining area & vogue kitchen extending onto an all-weather alfresco, set amidst low maintenance landscaped gardens with plenty of room for kids to play until their heart's content.
Resplendent in top-of-the-range appointments, including high ceilings, heightened doors, dishwasher, great storage thanks to a large pantry, substantial stone benchtops, 900mm stainless steel appliances, the kitchen is truly sublime.
Comprising of 4 stunning bedrooms, all complete with fitted built-in robes, sparkling central bathroom & a colossal master bedroom which features a generous walk-in-robe & impressive ensuite.
Highlights include luxury central bathroom, engineered bamboo floors, ducted-heating, powerful split-system cooling, roomy laundry with excellent storage & automated double garage/in-home access. This home needs to be on your must-inspect list!
Insights: 3 Penfold Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
ROOM, ROOM AND MORE ROOM!!
With an abundance of natural light, spacious living and ample accommodation, this outstanding residence offers plenty of room for the growing family. From the moment you step inside you will appreciate the flexible floor plan that allows the family to interact yet provides space for those who appreciate their privacy. 3 BEDROOMS, 2 BATHROOMS, 3 TOILETS, 4 LIVING AREAS. Comprising of ducted heating, evaporative cooling & a split system, impressive kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances & dishwasher over looking the meals/living area, rumpus room, formal lounge/optional study, upstairs retreat, master bedroom with ensuite featuring double vanity, walk in robe & balcony, double lock up garage and much more. All this plus a MASSIVE undercover alfresco entertaining area providing privacy and plenty of space to enjoy all year round to go along with the side access perfect for storage of the boat, caravan or trailer. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland. With all the amenities close by including local schools & shops, shopping centres, public transport & child care facilities, be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!
Insights: 37 Bowral Loop, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.
